column1: Even the liberal New York Times is now saying children are not significant spreaders of COVID-19. Its about time we open all of Maryland’s schools - anything less is harming our children and kowtowing to the teachers’ unions. https://t.co/o1I0oIGprO

Great to be on the lower shore yesterday! Started out at the OC commercial fishing harbor to discuss federal regulation of the seafood industry and the importance of horshoe crabs for developing a safe COVID vaccine with local watermen. Thanks to Sea Born Seafood for hosting! https://t.co/UV0BT4EQjM
Great news in Maryland no COVID deaths in the last 24 hours. As the data keeps coming in it grows ever more clear that it's time to open schools and all businesses.  https://t.co/uO41HBrsir
Thanks to President Trump and #OperationWarpSpeed we have dramatically reduced the fatality rate of COVID-19. https://t.co/tY94EpP59j

On top of vaccine development #OperationWarpSpeed is enabling the rapid roll out of safe and effective treatments for COVID-19 and already two are FDA authorized. Thanks to #OWS we have drastically cut the COVID-19 mortality rate and are improving outcomes across the board. https://t.co/4QUsvwvpz2
The Trump Administration's #OperationWarpSpeed is harnessing the power of science and American ingenuity to produce a safe and effective COVID-19 vaccine in record time. https://t.co/wfDexkdMup
Any talk of legalizing recreational marijuana is a bad idea especially in the midst of an opioid abuse and addiction crisis worsened by COVID. https://t.co/C4pRMU22Qs

According to the NIH the WHO and the American Lung Assoc. marijuana is MORE dangerous with COVID - it is NOT a treatment. Yet Speaker Pelosi insists on marijuana provisions in a COVID bill for the American people? https://t.co/FuaWU2kI8d

Marylanders should never delay getting needed medical care as it could lead to complications or long-term health problems. Our hospitals have seen declines in COVID admissions and are safe ready and waiting to address all of Marylanders’ medical care needs now #donotdelaycare
In areas like the Eastern Shore where the COVID threat is much lower we should move expeditiously to re-open the economy. https://t.co/ZiebTbcXeE
Another American innovation approved in the fight against COVID-19. American innovation will defeat the Wuhan virus. https://t.co/mYn57Qsefc

Maryland has announced a special health insurance enrollment period for uninsured individuals to help cover Coronavirus treatment costs. People can enroll until April 15th. More info can be found here:  https://t.co/mOW1Vq5qIM
Many have reached out about receiving payments under the recent Phase 3 Coronavirus bill. More info can be found here:  https://t.co/i3sAwBOW2E
$88 million in the Senate “emergency” Coronavirus bill for the Peace Corps-to last until September 2022??? #skipthepork #singleissuebills https://t.co/LTvrO6ST3P

The Senate “emergency” bill allows sanctuary cities to receive Justice Department grants that were stopped by the Trump administration. Sanctuary jurisdictions should not get federal money-and this is NOT related to the Coronavirus economic crisis.  #singleissuebills #skipthepork https://t.co/r7hzmFtlGh

Many constituents have reached out me with questions as to whether or not their business is allowed to remain open during this crisis.  See below for more detailed info on critical infrastructure during COVID-19:  https://t.co/9cH0JExCW3

Speaker Pelosi knows that we should be debating the merits of a corporate minimum wage and employee selected board memberships in a separate bill.  This is not related to an emergency Coronavirus response #singleissuebills https://t.co/a5fLaEME7v

In Speaker Pelosi’s bill only two colleges (out of thousands both just happening to be in DC and both private) were named to get a $20 million handout. Neither associated with COVID more than any other college. Thats the definition of an earmark. #singleissuebills #skipthepork https://t.co/8y7C0KMJaS

A totally new program to spend millions on expensive “renewable” jet fuel??? Only another $200 million under Speaker Pelosi’s “emergency” coronavirus bill. #skipthepork #singleissuebills https://t.co/Ka4OWellIA

This is really unbelievable. It’s on page 803 of the Speaker’s bill.  If Speaker Pelosi destroys the economy she won’t have to worry about getting the airline emissions part of the Green New Deal into the COVID-19 bill. That’s why we need #singleissuebills https://t.co/wBjYAOdX4I

What does nullifying the President’s exec order on federal employee union issues have to do with COVID-19?  We have small businesses going out of business and this is a priority for the coronavirus crisis? It’s on page 737 of Speaker Pelosi’s bill! #singleissuebills #skipthepork https://t.co/9diWCMyZVu
This is why we need #singleissuebills!!  What does selling spectrum on page 996 of the Speaker Pelosi bill have to do with coronavirus?? #skipthepork https://t.co/flaqi59MaX

No voter ID to get a ballot and anonymous “ballot harvesting”...why is that hidden in Speaker Pelosi’s coronavirus bill? These are issues that shouldn’t be addressed at this time. #singleissuebills https://t.co/SjV2V15Qeu
From Pelosi’s 1119 page COVID-19 Bill - what does forcing all states to have early voting have to do with coronavirus? #singleissuebills https://t.co/12AGe8n1bQ
Coronavirus will be defeated – here's how Americans together will do it:  https://t.co/u2XjiDBGnL

This is a critical moment for the US. While the Coronavirus bill tonight is not perfect I plan to vote for it. Now is the time to stand with @realDonaldTrump and work together without partisanship to limit the coronavirus and its harmful effects on our economy and way of life.
Precautionary tips about stopping the spread of Coronavirus from the medical practitioners in Congress #gopdoctorscaucus https://t.co/QhTkYMFz0q
I support the President's efforts to protect our nation and to blunt the effect of Covid-19 on our economy. https://t.co/weAlEke23D

Today I joined my Maryland Congressional colleagues on a call with @MDHealthDept Secretary Robert Neall regarding the extensive preparations the State of Maryland is undertaking to deal with the #coronavirus outbreak. https://t.co/NLJ5BtnuQ2
